fields.request: Manual QA: Validate EVCS heartbeat dashboard indicator
fields.request_details:
1. Sign in to the Django admin and open /admin/.
2. Confirm the Charge Points row displays a green check icon with the 'All rules met.' message while every EVCS shows a Last heartbeat within the past hour.
3. Edit an EVCS charge point (for example, via the Charge Points changelist) to set its Last heartbeat to more than one hour ago, save, and reload /admin/ to verify the red cross icon lists that EVCS identifier in the heartbeat warning. Revert the Last heartbeat change after capturing the error state.
